Sentence.sentence: Students use forums to chat, play games, and solve problems together at no cost, or they can pay a few hundred dollars to take courses with trained teachers.

sentences.en: I could give you a hundred reasons for not going.
sentences.cn: 我可以给你说出一百个不去的理由。

sentences.en: He has two hundred books.
sentences.cn: 他有二百本书。

means.word_mean: 许多，数量大；100 到 999 间的数目，百位数；某个世纪的年代；（表示 24 小时制的整点）一点、两点、三点等整

sentences.en: How many hundreds are there in thousand?
sentences.cn: 一千有多少个一百?

sentences.en: Hundreds of people were killed in the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 那次地震中有数百人死亡。</seg>

lj.lj_ly: I'm not a hundred per cent sure.

entry.def: A hundred or one hundred is the number 100.

example.ex: According to one official more than a hundred people have been arrested.
example.tran: 一名官员称有一百多人被捕。

entry.def: If you refer to hundreds of things or people, you are emphasizing that there are very many of them.

example.ex: Hundreds of tree species face extinction...
example.tran: 许许多多树种濒临灭绝。

example.ex: Today you can buy hundreds of flavours of ice-cream.
example.tran: 如今你可以买到很多种口味的冰激凌。

entry.def: You can use a hundred per cent or one hundred per cent to emphasize that you agree completely with something or that it is completely right or wrong.

example.ex: Are you a hundred per cent sure it's your neighbour?...
example.tran: 你百分之百肯定是你的邻居吗？

example.ex: I agree with you one hundred per cent.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English, from hund 'hundred' (from an Indo-European root shared with Latin centum and Greek hekaton) + a second element meaning 'number'; of Germanic origin and related to Dutch honderd and German hundert. The noun sense 'subdivision of a county' is of uncertain origin: it may originally have been equivalent to a hundred hides of land (see hide)

sentences.en: Currently, about one million personal computers in one hundred countries are involved in the World Grid.

sentences.en: The hundred and twenty ton aircraft was deeply mired.

sentences.en: Surprisingly, the king of farts managed to let out one hundred farts at one time.

sentences.en: A hundred years ago, nearly everyone was infected with pylori.

sentences.en: One hundred and fifty students from my school went on the field trip together.

sentences.en: His total score was one hundred and fifty five.

sentences.cn: 举例来说，在洪都拉斯西部的科潘玛雅古城开展工作的许多研究者，利用航空照片和徒步考查，发现了数百个小乡村和个人住所。
sentences.en: In one case, many researchers working around the ancient Maya city of Copan, Honduras, have located hundreds of small rural villages and individual dwellings by using aerial photographs and by making surveys on foot.

sentences.cn: 蒙大纳州景色优美,每年都吸引了许许多多的游客.
sentences.en: The splendor of Montana casts a spell on hundreds of thousands of tourists every year.

sentences.cn: 我有许许多多事情要做.
sentences.en: I have got a hundred things to do.

sentences.cn: 在资本主义国家里,一个律师可以找到许许多多办法来规避法律.
sentences.en: In the capitalist countries a lawyer might find a hundred ways to get round the law.

sentences.cn: 许多美国学院和综合大学都有男、女篮球队.
sentences.en: Hundreds of American colleges and universities have men's and women's basketball teams.

sentences.cn: 几百年来, 圣·伯纳德的狗挽救了许多穿越这个危险关隘旅行者的生命.
sentences.en: For hundreds of years, St Bernard dogs have saved the lives of travellers corssing the dangerous pass.

sentences.cn: 地球历经了许多亿年才创造了栖息其上的生命.
sentences.en: It took hundreds of millions of years to produce the life that now inhabits the earth.

sentences.cn: 从那以后,许多的患者得到了来自捐献者的角膜.
sentences.en: Hundreds of patients have received new corneas form from donors since then.

sentences.cn: 我自己,一个不能看见东西的人,仅仅通过触觉,都发现许许多多令我有兴趣的东西.
sentences.en: I who cannot see find hundreds of things to interest me through mere touch.

sentences.cn: 成功并不容易谈论,因为这个词语本身就有许多种定义.
sentences.en: Success is not easy to about because the word success itself has hundreds of definitions.

sentences.cn: 飓风掀去了许多房屋的屋顶.
sentences.en: The hurricane left hundreds of house roofless.

sentences.cn: 集团已经为我国许多省、市完成了数百项环保工程.
sentences.en: The group has completed hundreds of environmental protection project for many provinces and cities.

sentences.cn: 在其周围有许多人, 穿着红色长袍,外表像基督.
sentences.en: Around this image were hundreds of men which resembled Christ in appearance, dressed in red robes.

sentences.cn: 在我们决定前,我们有许多事情待考虑.
sentences.en: We have a hundred and one things to think of before we can decide.

sentences.cn: 许许多多的商人抓住机会狂赚一笔.
sentences.en: Hundreds of salesmen have seized the chance to make a few extra shillings.

sentences.cn: 展品中除了有这些大个生物外, 还有数百种有趣的小生物,放在许多玻璃容器中.
sentences.en: For all the big creatures at the exhibit, there are hundreds of smaller ones of interest.

sentences.cn: 两百人死于事故, 其中有许多儿童.
sentences.en: Two hundred people died in the accident, many of them children.

sentences.cn: 人们已经写了许多关于夏天的歌, 其中有一些是我们最喜欢的.
sentences.en: People have written and recorded hundreds of songs about summer. These are some of our favorites.

sentences.cn: 但是风筝已经使用了许多世纪了.
sentences.en: But kites have been used for many hundreds of years.

sentences.cn: 在询问了许许多多的细节问题之后,警察完成了初步调查.
sentences.en: The police completed a preliminary survey after asking hundreds of detailed questions.

sentences.cn: 对许多当地居民来说,这些城堡是百年外国统治的象征.
sentences.en: To many local people these castles represent a hundred years of foreign domination.

sentences.cn: 许多年之后,一个叫做表的机器被发明了.
sentences.en: Hundreds of years later a machine called clock was invented.

sentences.cn: 许多区域性的总雨量将会达到三百毫米左右.
sentences.en: Many regional rain totals will be around three hundred centimeters.

sentences.cn: 上百条的溪流贯穿于南部的这个州, 而且许多(支流)里有很多短吻鳄.
sentences.en: Hundreds of them flow through this southern state, and many are full of alligators!

sentences.cn: 开幕式吸引了许多信教群众和游客前来观看.
sentences.en: Hundreds of Buddhists and tourists swarmed the monastery to watch the tangka ceremony.

sentences.cn: 欧洲使用了羊皮纸许多上百年.
sentences.en: Europeans used parchment for many hundreds of years.
